ComicInfo.Summary: MORTAL COMBAT! Fully embracing his Archangel heritage, Detective Jonah Wright has brutally battled his way through the ancient tournament, EPOCH. Now, finally, he has an opportunity to confront the murderer of his dead partner, Michael, and exact his own brand of justice. Will Jonah triumph and maintain the Angels' benevolent control over the Supernatural Council, or will he become just another body left on the tournament floor?
